short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All-in-one ChatGPT conversation export plugin, copy or export ChatGPT web page content, support multiple formats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üìô Feature

Quickly copy or export ChatGPT conversations, one-click download and save chat history.

üìã Supported formats

Export ChatGPT to Markdown,  Screenshot, PDF, HTML, Excel, etc. 
Go to the home page to see all supported formats
https://chatopenai.pro/exportgpt/

How to upgrade to ExportGPT Pro
https://chatopenai.pro/exportgpt-pro/

‚öôÔ∏è Supported features

- Preview, modify, copy, download target format files
- Customize the export button that needs to be displayed
- Export settings: file name insert chat update time
- Support exporting ChatGPT shared links
- Support image content
- Support custom export dialogue content, select all, inverse select, only select the answer

‚öíÔ∏è Tips for use

1. Open ChatGPT, chat with ChatGPT
     https://chat.openai.com
2. The ExportGPT plugin will place a column of sidebar buttons on the right side of the page, click the format you want to export
3. In the pop-up panel, you can preview, modify, copy or download the content to be exported

üîó Links

- Export any web content to Markdown format: https://chatopenai.pro/web2markdown/

üôã Feedback

Any questions or BUG submissions, please leave a message at https://chatopenai.pro/exportgpt/
or contact admin@chatopenai.pro
